explanation: [0-0] A man in a red cape stands in an area with lush vegetation. The caption "Hulk Vampire Transformation" appears on the screen. The background is filled with green plants.

[0-4] The man in the red cape crosses his arms, suddenly walks towards the camera, his eyes turn red, revealing sharp teeth, and a ferocious expression. The scene then cuts to a man in a blue T-shirt facing the camera with a surprised expression, then falls to the ground in fear. The scene cuts back to the man in the red cape, eyes red, talking to the camera. Then the man who fell to the ground gets up with his arms crossed over his chest, his skin turns green, and leaves fly around him.
